CustomField.description: Friendly name displayed in timeline component for the thread.
CustomField.formula: Name + IF(CRM_Number_of_unread_Messages__c != 0, ' (' + TEXT(CRM_Number_of_unread_Messages__c) + IF(CRM_Number_of_unread_Messages__c > 1, ' uleste meldinger', ' ulest melding' ), ' (Lest' ) + IF(CRM_Is_Closed__c, ' | AVSLUTTET', ' | Ã…PEN' ) + ')'
CustomField.label: Timeline Name
